rules: (compare='==' | plus='+' | equals='=' | minus='-' | asterisk='*' | percent='%' | greater='>' | lesser='<')

(comma=',' | backslash='\\' | single="'" | double='"' | semicolon=';' | colon=':' | slash='/' | lapping='(' | rapping=')' | lace='{' | race='}' | period='.' | lack='[' | rack=']' | exclamation='!' | (at sign)='@' | poundsign='#' | dollarsign='$' | ampersand='&' | caret='^' | underscore='_' | dash='-')

(alpha=a| bravo=b | charlie=c | delta=d | eureka=e | foxtrot=f | golf=g | hotel=h | india=i | juliet=j | kilo=k | lima=l | michael=m | november=n | oscar=o | peter=p | quiet=q | romeo=r | sierra=s | tango=t | uniform=u | victor=v | whiskey=w | xray=x | yankee=y | zulu=z)
